title: "Less than a quarter of firms report that introducing AI has led to a loss of jobs"
excerpt: "Less than a quarter of firms introducing AI technology over the past five years believe it has led to a net loss of jobs, a new survey led by academics at the University of Warwick and the University of Sussex Business School reveals."
